item.title: Will Toronto's Crime Rate Ever Decrease?
item.description: Jin Long Cao Abstract Toronto is a highly populated location which means it’s crime rate will also be high. But will Toronto’s crime rate ever lower? In this paper we explore opendatatoronto’s dataset on “Neighbourhood Crime Rates”. We find that as Toronto’s population increase, the crime rate will increase with it. Introduction There are 2,731,571 total people living in neighbourhoods around Toronto in 2019, with that total number increasing every year.

item.title: Perception of Covid-19 Measures by The Ontario Government During the Second Wave
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
